title: Misty Predation
story: The thick, coiling mist seems to animate the castle itself, providing cover for its monstrous inhabitants. Every shadow holds a deeper threat.
effect: While this card is active, all Vampire Sisters (Mary, Sade, Luci) gain +2 movement steps each turn. Due to the reduced visibility, combat rolls against any Vampire Sister or Dracula suffer a -1 penalty. This penalty does not apply if the hero is in the First Tower Bedroom, Master Bedroom, or Second Tower Bedroom.
